name: Prismanic
description:
A classic style arcade game where you need to hit targets with color matching projectiles in order to clear levels before time runs out. The more you clear, the more colors you have to deal with with less time for each level.

Maximize you hit streak and score!

For a real challenge and a lot more points, you can enable hard mode. Hard mode automatically loops through the colors that you fire. Aim wisely.

This game was designed for Android and plays much better on it.
